description: Data models for checkout calculations, payment processing, and transaction state management

components.CheckoutCalculation: Immutable calculation model for checkout totals with comprehensive financial formatting and validation.

rules: Immutable calculation model ensuring financial data consistency throughout checkout process.
Comprehensive financial components: subtotal, tip, tax, discount, and total calculations.
Item count tracking for transaction summary and receipt generation.
Empty factory constructor providing zero-state initialization for new checkout sessions.
Formatted currency getters with consistent \$XX.XX formatting for UI display.
Negative discount formatting with proper minus sign prefix for visual clarity.
Tax rate calculation and percentage formatting for receipt and compliance reporting.
Boolean state getters: hasTip, hasDiscount, hasItems for conditional UI rendering.
CopyWith pattern for immutable updates during checkout calculation progression.
Professional toString method providing concise calculation summary for debugging.
Value-based equality implementation ensuring calculation comparisons work correctly.
Comprehensive hashCode implementation supporting Set and Map operations with calculations.
Zero-safe division in tax rate calculation preventing runtime errors.
Financial precision with toStringAsFixed(2) for proper monetary display formatting.
Validation logic through boolean getters enabling checkout flow control.
Immutable design pattern preventing accidental financial calculation modifications.

components.CheckoutState: Comprehensive checkout state model managing both ticket-based and quick sale checkout workflows.

rules: Dual checkout mode support: ticket-based checkout and quick sale workflow in single state model.
Comprehensive payment state management: tip percentage, custom tip amount, discount application.
Payment method selection with validation ensuring proper payment processing workflow.
Service assignment validation ensuring all services have assigned technicians before checkout.
Error handling with errorMessage field for user feedback and debugging support.
Processing state management preventing multiple concurrent payment operations.
Customer association for both ticket and quick sale modes with optional customer assignment.
Validation logic through computed properties: allServicesAssigned, hasItems, canProcessPayment.
Quick sale item management with quantity tracking and service type differentiation.
Unassigned services identification for workflow validation and technician assignment.
Tip display formatting supporting both percentage and custom amount presentations.
JSON serialization support for state persistence and data exchange with backend systems.
CopyWith pattern for immutable state updates throughout checkout process.
Professional toString method providing checkout state summary for debugging and logging.
Value-based equality implementation focusing on key checkout state properties.
Comprehensive business logic validation ensuring checkout process integrity and compliance.
Service type enumeration integration for different item types in quick sale workflow.
Payment method enumeration support for various payment processing options.
State management optimized for reactive UI updates using MobX or similar state management.

components.DiscountData: Comprehensive discount data model supporting percentage and fixed discounts with audit trail.
components.DiscountType: Enumeration defining discount calculation methods: percentage or fixed amount.

rules: Dual discount type support: percentage-based and fixed amount discounts with proper calculation methods.
Audit trail integration capturing technician PIN, ID, and application timestamp for compliance tracking.
Discount amount calculation with subtotal clamping preventing fixed discounts from exceeding order total.
Display value formatting with appropriate symbols: percentage (%) and currency ($) notation.
Validation logic ensuring required fields: reason, positive value, technician PIN, and technician ID.
JSON serialization support for data persistence and API communication with proper type handling.
CopyWith pattern for immutable updates during discount modification workflows.
Professional toString method providing discount summary for debugging and logging purposes.
Value-based equality implementation for discount comparison and deduplication logic.
Comprehensive hashCode implementation supporting Set and Map operations with discount objects.
DiscountType enumeration with string name mapping for JSON serialization compatibility.
Factory constructor for JSON deserialization with fallback handling for invalid discount types.
DateTime integration for timestamp tracking supporting audit requirements and reporting.
Subtotal calculation protection preventing negative discounts and over-discounting scenarios.
Immutable design pattern ensuring discount data integrity throughout application lifecycle.

components.Discount: Comprehensive discount model supporting percentage, fixed, and employee discounts with business rules and validation.

rules: Multi-type discount support: percentage, fixed amount, and employee discounts with specialized calculation logic.
Business rules enforcement: minimum order amounts, maximum discount limits, and expiration date validation.
Authorization tracking with employee ID for audit trail and compliance requirements.
Discount code support enabling promotional campaigns and tracking discount usage.
Comprehensive discount calculation with subtotal validation and limit enforcement.
Expiration date handling with automatic validity checking for time-limited promotions.
Display name generation with user-friendly formatting: percentage symbols and currency notation.
Description builder creating detailed discount information with conditions and limits.
Factory constructors for common discount types: percentage(), fixed(), and employee() with appropriate defaults.
Predefined common discounts list providing typical salon discount options for quick selection.
JSON serialization with JsonSerializable annotation for data persistence and API communication.
CopyWith pattern for immutable updates during discount modification and application workflows.
Professional toString method providing discount summary for debugging and logging purposes.
Value-based equality implementation for discount comparison and deduplication in checkout systems.
Comprehensive business logic ensuring discount amounts never exceed subtotals or specified maximums.

components.PaymentResult: Comprehensive payment result model supporting both ticket-based and quick sale transactions with complete financial breakdown.

rules: Dual transaction mode support: ticket-based checkout and quick sale workflow with appropriate data structures.
Complete financial breakdown: subtotal, tip, discount, tax, and total amounts for comprehensive transaction records.
Payment method integration with enumeration support for cash, card, and other payment types.
Transaction timestamp tracking with processedAt for audit trails and reporting requirements.
Technician PIN capture for authorization tracking and compliance with discount application workflows.
Customer association support with optional customer ID for both ticket and quick sale modes.
Quick sale item integration with list of QuickSaleItem objects for itemized quick sale transactions.
Ticket ID collection supporting multiple ticket checkout scenarios in single payment transaction.
JSON serialization support for payment processing, data persistence, and API communication.
CopyWith pattern for immutable updates during payment processing and result modification workflows.
PaymentMethod enumeration integration with string serialization for consistent payment method handling.
Professional toString method providing payment summary for debugging and logging purposes.
Value-based equality implementation focusing on core payment identification and amount validation.
Comprehensive hashCode implementation supporting payment result operations in collections.
Transaction mode differentiation through isQuickSale flag enabling appropriate business logic routing.

components.QuickSaleItem: Quick sale item model supporting services, products, and gift cards with technician assignment and quantity management.
components.ServiceType: Enumeration defining item types: service, product, and giftCard for quick sale categorization.

rules: Multi-type item support: service, product, and gift card items with appropriate business logic differentiation.
Quantity management with total price calculation supporting multiple unit purchases.
Technician assignment system with validation ensuring services have assigned technicians.
Service type enumeration with string serialization for consistent item categorization.
Business rule validation: services require technician assignment, products and gift cards do not.
Total price calculation with quantity multiplication for accurate financial calculations.
Item validation logic ensuring all required fields are populated based on service type.
JSON serialization support for quick sale data persistence and API communication.
CopyWith pattern for immutable updates during item modification and checkout workflows.
Professional toString method providing item summary for debugging and transaction logging.
Value-based equality implementation ensuring accurate item comparison and deduplication.
Comprehensive hashCode implementation supporting quick sale item operations in collections.
ServiceType fallback handling with default service type for data integrity.
Optional technician assignment supporting both service and non-service item types.
Immutable design pattern ensuring data consistency throughout quick sale transaction lifecycle.
